backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three UI features to affected frontend files and components.

frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining a pastel romantic color palette and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app layout showing header, teddy animation, and the apology letter card.
frontend/src/components/ApologyLetterCar: Letter card with decorative hearts, message content, a footer prompt, and a button opening the video modal.
Modal video player component showing the local kiss.mp4 video with close controls.
frontend/src/components/TeddyAnimation.t: Teddy bear illustration with floating heart animations sized responsively.
frontend/src/content/apologyLetter.ts: Exports a long apology letter string with emotive Hinglish text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and refreshes a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, state, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, pastel theme variables, dark mode colors, custom utilities, and animations for the romantic visual theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors tied to CSS variables, extended theming, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
